segments.text: Yes , I've been sitting here for a few minutes . I'm waiting for someone to put gas in my car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . But this is the self-service pump .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . You must fill up the car yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm from Taiwan . I never heard of a gas station where you fill up your own car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In America , most gas stations are like this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I really have to do it ? I don't know how .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , since this is your first time , I will do it for you.But next time , if you want a full-service gas station , you should look at the sign .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Under the sign for the gas station , there will be a smaller sign that says Self-Serve or Full-Service.And some gas stations have both.But if they have both , some pumps will be self-serve and some will be full-serve.You have to look at the signs .
segments.speaker: S1
